aboutpara: A person with more than 3 years experience as a frontend developer, and has been in the programming world for more than 5 years. Learning and continuing to learn is the key to my life. Have interest and skills in JavaScript, TypeScript, React.js, Next.Js, CSS, HTML, and other web developer components. Hiking and coffee are my hobbies, playing games and watching anime are my spare time.
